moduleMetadataJson.name: OSX Password Prompt Spoof
moduleMetadataJson.description: Presents a password prompt dialog to a logged-in OSX user.
author: Joff Thyer <jsthyer@gmail.com>
joev <joev@metasploit.com>
Peter Toth <globetother@gmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: TEXTCREDS
options.default: Type your password to allow System Preferences to make changes
options.description: Text displayed when asking for password

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: Timeout for user to enter credentials
